data.title: Couple massage
data.text: This spa was great!!! Not overly priced and they offered the 80 minute couples massage! Called that morning and were in that afternoon. Luxurious, all the Bell's and whistles and great massage!

owner_response.author: SpaAtlantis, Owner at Spa Atlantis, responded to this review
owner_response.text: The best feeling in the world is to know that we have exceeded your expectations. Thank you for choosing to spend your time while in New Orleans at Spa Atlantis. We pride ourselves on giving our customers great service at an affordable price and we are honored that you chose us while visiting. Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your trip and we hope that when you visit Nola again you will reach out. Your review is much appreciated!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great spa
data.text: Great hot stone massage; wonderful shower with great smelling products.  Would highly recommend.  Annie was a great masseuse

owner_response.author: SpaAtlantis, Owner at Spa Atlantis, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We love your positive feedback about Spa Atlantis. We do take pride in catering to our guests’ needs the best way we can so please reach out the next time you are in need of a bit of pampering!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic
data.text: Whitney was fantastic! My facial was delightful. She explained the products used, and listened to my skin concerns and addressed them. The entire experience was one of the best I've had.

owner_response.author: SpaAtlantis, Owner at Spa Atlantis, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for such a great review! We work very hard to offer exceptional service in a warm environment, so we are overjoyed to see that reflected in your last visit. I made sure to share your experience and kind words with our entire staff and we truly hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fabulous Massage and Pedicure
data.text:
My husband and I came here for our honeymoon and it was his first massage. Lessee did a great job addressing the pain in his leg and lower back.  I have had several massages but none compare to how phenomenal Ashley was.  I carry stress in my neck,  shoulders,  and back and she worked magic like none other.  
We finished with fantastic pedicures by Elsa and Doris.  Hands down the best spa experience!

owner_response.author: SpaAtlantis, General Manager at Spa Atlantis, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you very much for such a great review! We work very hard to offer exceptional service in a warm environment, so we are overjoyed to see that reflected in your last visit. I made sure to share your experience and kind words with our entire staff and we truly hope to see you again soon!
Respectfully,

Katie Delgado
Spa Director
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: May go again
data.text:
This was one of the best experiences in my traveling history. Amy took such good care of me. Best massage EVER!

Then I followed it with a facial. The services were so great. I am thinking about going again tomorrow. 
I felt like I was in heaven!!!

owner_response.author: SpaAtlantis, General Manager at Spa Atlantis, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
The best feeling in the world is to know that we have exceeded your expectations. Thank you for choosing to spend your time while in New Orleans at Spa Atlantis. We pride ourselves on giving our customers great service at an affordable price and we are honored that you chose us while visiting. Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your trip and we hope that when you visit Nola again you will reach out. Your review is much appreciated!
Respectfully,

Katie Delgado
Spa Director
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great experience
data.text: I highly recommend this spa for all the visitor of New Orleans. 80min massage is really worthy. Profesional and attentive personnel. (Thumb up)

data.title: The perfect spa experience
data.text: Perfect from the moment I picked up the phone! It was my last day in New Orleans and my flight was in the evening so I had a few hours to spare. I love going to the spa as much as I can so this was a great opportunity. The spa was a block from my hotel so it seemed the best location for me. If I had only known I would of been there everyday! So it starts with a quick phone call fingers crossed there is an opening for a massage. The girls that helped me at the front desk should run MULTI MILLION dollar companies. They represent! I walked in and felt so peaceful and greeted like family. They stored my bag and I was whisked away to the spa area. Robes, steam room, every essential a woman could need, hot showers, lockers, quiet spaces and super clean :) Carly! OMG this amazing healer should be on everyones bucket list. Incredible massage, and so sweet. I am very grateful that I experienced such a day of pampering in a gorgeous city. I was asked at every opportunity if I needed anything and engaged in conversation. It was an A plus plus experience. I will forever be a regular when In New Orleans. Jazz Fest Friends are on their way. Thank you again Spa Atlantis. :)

data.title: Amazing Spa....!
data.text: I have been going to this spa for three years now and all I can say is it's amazing... Whitney gives the BEST facials and almost everyone gives amazing massages.. The customer service there is amazing... I have no complaints AT ALL... I would most deifintely recommend this spa to anyone..

data.title: Elsa for nails!!
data.text: She has won me over as a regular now. Professional, always on time, and very pleased with the end product always. Highly recommend! Great location for CBD workers. Plus, the spa only uses CND shellac so you are guaranteed for high quality / long lasting manicures.

data.title: Wonderful First Spa Experience
data.text: Although my college-age standards of a spa are not terribly high, Spa Atlantis has truly set the bar exceptionally high for any future spa experiences. I received a gift certificate for the Complete Relaxation Package for Christmas and booked my spa day for the Monday after New Years. With this package, I got to encounter about 4 or 5 different employees who were all accommodating and took the time to explain each part of my day. I was there for about 5 hours between the body wrap, massage, facial, lunch (awesome), manicure and pedicure and I don't think I have ever been that relaxed for such a big chunk of time in my life. Awesome atmosphere and I definitely recommend Spa Atlantis to anyone who needs some serious relaxation time

data.title: What a treat
data.text: Staying at the Roosevelt and desirous of a spa day but turned off by the prices, I did a bit of research and found this free standing downtown spa. It was just a short walk from the hotel. The service was good and my treatments, a  90 minute massage and a facial were about what I would have paid for one facial at the Roosevelt. I can't recommend this enough.

data.title: Wow
data.text: While accompanying my spouse to a conference at the Roosevelt, I wanted a spa day. The prices at the hotel were obscene. A bit of research  found Spa Atlantis. The services were fantastic and a fraction of the price. It was a very short walk from the hotel. I would recommend this spa to anyone.

data.title: Truly Exceptional!
data.text: I was so pleased with my nail services on my first visit, I booked a polish change and a full make-up visit. The services are top notch but what makes the Spa Atlantis so exceptional is it's staff. I came in a stranger and left as a friend, Thank you so very much! See you in 2017 but I would like it to be sooner:)

data.title: Relaxing Spa Day with Friends
data.text:
This is a lovely and relatively reasonably priced day spa with two locations (one in the French Quarter and one in the Central Business District). My friends and I were in town to celebrate a 40th birthday of one of us and booked massages and facials for the three of us. 

They were able to get us in on relatively short notice to have massages and facials all at the same time, which was awesome. They have a clean facility with a changing room with lockers and a shower facility, which is a nice amenity. 

My facial was fine, though nothing about it particularly stood out. 

My massage therapist, Annie, was AWESOME. In addition to being a great massage therapist with a great, firm touch who really listened to me and gave me exactly the kind of massage I asked for, she made helpful suggestions about things to do and see in New Orleans. Totally awesome. 

The only snag was that when the owner checked us out, he accidentally charged one of our credit cards twice and one of our cards not at all. He insisted that he did it right and we were skeptical. We were right and worked it out among us but it was annoying to deal with afterwards.

data.title: Great Experience!
data.text: This is a spa that is in the French Quarter so it would be great for travelers!  They offer a variety of services.  I was checked in by the very personable and friendly Katy.  I was offered a glass of wine or coffee.  Candace gave me a wonderful hair cut and style!  The inside of the building is modern, lovely, and relaxing.  I understand they have some wonderful massage therapists and nail techs, too!  Just remember to build time into your schedule for parking as it is in the Quarter.  An all-round lovely experience!

data.title: high recommently
data.text: My husband and I were in Danang for business and decided last minute to get a massage. We both agreed that it was one of the best massages we have ever had. The place is beautiful and immaculate.

data.title: Great experience
data.text: Our experience at Spa Atlantis was excellent. Ask for Domini--my mani and pedi were flawless, and you could tell that she was committed to getting the nails exactly as I wanted. Super happy with the Spa and Domini.

data.title: Amazing Massage
data.text: My husband and I are in New Orleans for business and decided last minute to get a massage. We both agreed that it was one of the best massages we have ever had. The place is beautiful and immaculate. Our therapists (Ash and Annie) were excellent. When we first arrived, we were seated in a quiet, relaxing and dimly lit room and offered champagne or other cold drinks.  We had 50-minute massages and wished we had stayed for the 80-minute. Since our anniversary falls on this weekend we decided to go back and have another treatment and check out the French Quarter location.  Can't wait. 👍

data.title: Amazing spa experience
data.text: Colleague and I grabbed a spa day during a legal conference. This spa is in a charming building- we were told it used to be dairy. Ambiance is quiet and refreshing. Hair, pedis and massages were the services we chose. Highly recommend Candice for hair, Tara for massage and Dodi for pedi. For outstanding day spa, and NOLA area- this was very reasonably priced. All three services and tips- under $400. Amazing service.

data.title: Fantastic Experience .. will be back regularly!
data.text: I just moved to New Orleans and tried Spa Atlantis as my new go to wax place.  Highly recommend!  I can honestly say the best wax I have ever had!  Whitney was super sweet and did a fantastic job.  Highly recommend!
